Hi.
I Just Put together my first sim rig only to find out the Simsonn plus x
brake pedal isn't registering.
The Clutch and the Accelerator work both on the Simsonn app and when I go
to "Set up usb Game Controllers" Control Panel.
I tried switching the wires on the control box and the clutch and the
accelerator both work in every slot, just not the brake pedal.
I've checked the cable itself and nothing looks wrong. It goes into where
the load cell is located.
This is my first time using them.
Any suggestions?
Looks good other than that ?

Best wishes and good racing
Sigurgeir Heidarsson

conversations.body_text:
Update.
Widened the gap behind the brake pedal and that seems to have fixed it.
I guess it must have been blocking some sensor.

Hi Sigurgeir Heiðarsson,  Please click Offset, take a screenshot of the popup window, and send it to me. Then, follow the procedure to reset the pedal’s original signal to zero. In addition, please take a clear, complete photo of the side of the brake pedal and send it to me. I will help determine whether it is a calibration issue or a sensor fault. If the sensor is confirmed to be defective, we can send you a replacement sensor for installation.
